subprojects.name: HonestDiD
subprojects.desc: Stata version of R's HonestDiD package (Rambachan and Roth, 2022).

subprojects.name: MulTE
subprojects.desc: Companion Stata package for Goldsmith-Pinkham, Hull, and Michal Kolesar (2022).

subprojects.name: staggered
subprojects.desc: Stata version of R's staggered package (Roth and Sant'Anna, 2023).

subprojects.name: pretrends
subprojects.desc: Stata version of R's pretrends package (Roth, 2022).

subprojects.name: alogit
subprojects.desc: Companion stata command for the model in Abaluck and Adams-Prassl (2021).

subprojects.name: parquet
subprojects.desc: Import and export parquet files from Stata using Arrow's C++ API.

subprojects.name: power
subprojects.desc: Personal notes and Stata programs to aid in power analysis (parametric and simulation; clustering and stratification).

subprojects.name: diffiv
subprojects.desc: Fast implementation of Gandhi and Houde (2016) style instruments.

subprojects.name: shasum
subprojects.desc: Wrapper for OpenSSL implementation of various cryptographic hash functions (SHA1, etc.).

subprojects.name: mcmisc
subprojects.desc: Collection of miscellaneous Stata snippets and utilities.

subprojects.name: matrix-tools
subprojects.desc: Various utilities to work with Stata matrices.

subprojects.name: gmail-download
subprojects.desc: Download and sort all gmail e-mails into various formats using the Gmail API.

subprojects.name: gre-cli-words
subprojects.desc: Show a random GRE vocab word in the command line.

subprojects.name: highlight-sas-stata
subprojects.desc: Various implementations highlighting SAS and Stata (pygments, listings, highlight.js)
